summary: An elegant weather reporter on TV and a foul-mouthed boozer off, Hyun-woo juggles three relationships with three men of different personalities. This is the "love story" of her life.
cast: Joon-young Jung|So-yeon Kim|Seo-jin Lee|Seung-gi Lee|Chae-Won Moon|Soo-Ah Park|Hwa-young Ryu|Ga-in Son
keywords: best friends in love|best friends|weather woman|affair with married man
title: Oneului yeonae
